summary: Phase 2 RV Service Desk Agent Hardening - Complete testing of all acceptance criteria successfully completed. All 535 tests pass with 0 failures.
passed_tests: AC1: Blown fuse does NOT trigger isolation or pivot - PASSED

AC3: 12V electrical steps are directive action-first, not yes/no questions - PASSED
AC3: Each step includes reply format guidance - PASSED
AC4: Serviceability metadata resolves correctly for all known findings - PASSED
AC4: getFindingMeta returns null for unknown/fuse findings - PASSED
Tripped breaker and no-power-downstream also NOT key findings - PASSED
Seized motor IS still a key finding and allows transition - PASSED
Full scenario: fuse→replace→continue→motor seized→transition allowed - PASSED
All 535 tests pass across 32 test files with 0 failures - PASSED
